hits.name: Bifrost Orbital
hits.long_description: Bifrost Orbital is building the SSH for satellites, i.e., creating a network of satellites to ensure continuous, real-time communication for other satellites in space. Our technology allows customers to monitor and control their satellites 24/7, just like accessing a computer remotely. We offer reliable, low-power, and backward-compatible solutions that work for both small and large spacecraft, making space operations more efficient and connected.

long_description.value: Bifrost Orbital is building the SSH for satellites, i.e., creating a network of satellites to ensure continuous, real-time communication for other satellites in space. Our technology allows customers to monitor and control their satellites 24/7, just like accessing a computer remotely. We offer reliable, low-power, and backward-compatible solutions that work for both small and large spacecraft, making space operations more efficient and connected.

hits.name: HumanLayer
hits.long_description: HumanLayer is an API and SDK that lets AI agents contact humans on slack/email when they need approval, feedback, or input. For example, if an AI Agent elects to send an email to a prospect or update production data, AI engineers can require human approval on that action.

long_description.value: HumanLayer is an API and SDK that lets AI agents contact humans on slack/email when they need approval, feedback, or input. For example, if an AI Agent elects to send an email to a prospect or update production data, AI engineers can require human approval on that action.

hits.name: Bramble
hits.long_description:
Bramble is an AI-powered real estate brokerage that provides end-to-end homebuying services for a simple flat fee. Set up tours, evaluate homes, submit offers, and close confidently - with on-demand support from expert agents and AI-backed tools when you need it.

We opened early access in CA and in a few weeks saw hundreds of sign-ups, several touring buyers, and have submitted multiple offers across the state - all with near-zero marketing spend. We just offered buyers what they really wanted: a high-quality experience for a reasonable price.
hits.one_liner: AI-powered buyer real estate brokerage with a simple flat fee
hits.subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

long_description.value:
Bramble is an AI-powered real estate brokerage that provides end-to-end homebuying services for a simple flat fee. Set up tours, evaluate homes, submit offers, and close confidently - with on-demand support from expert agents and AI-backed tools when you need it.

We opened early access in CA and in a few weeks saw hundreds of sign-ups, several touring buyers, and have submitted multiple offers across the state - all with near-zero marketing spend. We just offered buyers what they really wanted: a high-quality experience for a reasonable price.

one_liner.value: AI-powered buyer real estate brokerage with a simple flat fee

hits.name: Alex
hits.long_description:
Tired of switching tabs to cursor every time you're building your iOS app in Xcode?

Worry not!

Alex is a sidebar app that works directly with Xcode, and has the same Cmd+L, Cmd+K, and Apply Code commands as Cursor. And, it's super fast.

Check it out: https://alexsidebar.app

hits.name: Curo
hits.long_description:
Curo helps electric fleets park and charge their vehicles anywhere with the world’s largest private network of underutilized EV charging sites. We increase revenue by 5x for EV charger owners and enable instant fleet electrification at a fraction of the cost. 

Owners of EV chargers get <10% utilization after paying hundreds of thousands of dollars to install, and distributed fleets are rapidly trying to electrify yet charging is a huge bottleneck. Curo is a Virtual Depot platform enabling fleets to long-term lease underutilized EV chargers from owners.

We're live across CA, NY and WA and have grown 100% MoM for the past 4 months. Curo is already backed by investors like Blue Bear, Not Boring, Slow and Eniac.
hits.one_liner: Electric fleets park and charge anywhere with Curo

long_description.value:
Curo helps electric fleets park and charge their vehicles anywhere with the world’s largest private network of underutilized EV charging sites. We increase revenue by 5x for EV charger owners and enable instant fleet electrification at a fraction of the cost. 

Owners of EV chargers get <10% utilization after paying hundreds of thousands of dollars to install, and distributed fleets are rapidly trying to electrify yet charging is a huge bottleneck. Curo is a Virtual Depot platform enabling fleets to long-term lease underutilized EV chargers from owners.

We're live across CA, NY and WA and have grown 100% MoM for the past 4 months. Curo is already backed by investors like Blue Bear, Not Boring, Slow and Eniac.

one_liner.value: Electric fleets park and charge anywhere with Curo

hits.name: Manicode
hits.long_description:
Chat with Manicode to edit your codebase. It's like a junior engineer at your command, but faster! Get it now:
```
> npm install -g manicode
```
Run `manicode` from your project directory. It will read and write to files in your project to produce the code you want.

Manicode is different from all the other coding agents, we swear!

Why it's cool:
- **It chooses files to read automatically on each message** — unlike Cursor’s composer feature. This saves you time and makes Manicode respond more comprehensively.
- **It takes 0 clicks** — type your instructions and Manicode will edit your files directly. It's simple and fast. Theoretically, you can do all your development by just chatting with it!
- **It has full access to your terminal** — Manicode can run terminal commands to install packages, run tests, check for type errors, etc. Manicode is an engineer working for you.
hits.one_liner: Code with AI from our CLI

long_description.value:

Run `manicode` from your project directory. It will read and write to files in your project to produce the code you want.

Manicode is different from all the other coding agents, we swear!

Why it's cool:
- **It chooses files to read automatically on each message** — unlike Cursor’s composer feature. This saves you time and makes Manicode respond more comprehensively.
- **It takes 0 clicks** — type your instructions and Manicode will edit your files directly. It's simple and fast. Theoretically, you can do all your development by just chatting with it!
- **It has full access to your terminal** — Manicode can run terminal commands to install packages, run tests, check for type errors, etc. Manicode is an engineer working for you.

one_liner.value: Code with AI from our CLI

hits.name: Replexica
hits.long_description: Replexica automates localization end-to-end. It instantly produces translations, eliminates manual work, and needs no translation management software. Our AI generates pull requests with translations when developers commit UI code changes, avoiding the typical back-and-forth with translation agencies. This helps teams do localization 100x faster, ship to production more often, without bottlenecks.
hits.one_liner: Automated AI localization for multilingual software.

hits.name: Protegee
hits.long_description:
We’re excited to launch our first product that allows your AI voice agents to accept payments easily and securely over the phone. We manage compliance, security, and fraud, letting you focus on creating great experiences.  


We are setting the stage for the agentic economy, starting with voice payments. Web and agent-to-agent transactions coming soon.

hits.name: Astrix Health
hits.long_description: Astrix offers an SDK designed for health tech developers to create safer, more reliable LLM applications. Our platform helps identify clinical safety issues, generate synthetic medical data, and conduct thorough application testing, allowing developers to quickly deliver powerful, safe generative AI solutions that benefit patients and providers alike.
hits.one_liner: Astrix is the toolkit for building safer health LLM applications.

long_description.value: Astrix offers an SDK designed for health tech developers to create safer, more reliable LLM applications. hits.name: Vocera
hits.long_description:
Are you building AI voice agents like receptionists, customer support, or sales reps? Do you find yourself manually testing your bot by calling it? We faced similar challenges, especially being in a regulated industry. That's why we developed Vocera - a solution that automates the testing process for your voice agents. With Vocera, you can prove your reliability before going live, test every update seamlessly, and scale your operations efficiently.

Replicating a real world conversation is hard. Our AI simulates these scenarios using workflows, personas and past conversations.

We are already talking to AI for ordering food, getting appointments and even interviews. The market is aptly getting flooded with AI voice agents built by thousands of companies. We make them dependable.

long_description.value:
Are you building AI voice agents like receptionists, customer support, or sales reps? Do you find yourself manually testing your bot by calling it? We faced similar challenges, especially being in a regulated industry. That's why we developed Vocera - a solution that automates the testing process for your voice agents. With Vocera, you can prove your reliability before going live, test every update seamlessly, and scale your operations efficiently.

Replicating a real world conversation is hard. Our AI simulates these scenarios using workflows, personas and past conversations.

We are already talking to AI for ordering food, getting appointments and even interviews. The market is aptly getting flooded with AI voice agents built by thousands of companies. We make them dependable.

hits.name: Regatta Storage
hits.long_description: Regatta Storage allows teams to access their S3 buckets as a local file system, saving 90% on storage costs. With Regatta, engineers can run data analytics directly on S3 -- eliminating data movement for these large data sets. For example, AI companies use Regatta to run their model training directly on data sets stored in S3. Regatta accelerates data access, so your applications experience optimized, local-like performance. Regatta's storage scales with your applications, and you only pay for what you use -- no need to guess how much storage or performance you need. With no complex configuration, you can set up Regatta in a single click.
hits.one_liner: Transform S3 into a high-performance local disk

long_description.value: Regatta Storage allows teams to access their S3 buckets as a local file system, saving 90% on storage costs. With Regatta, engineers can run data analytics directly on S3 -- eliminating data movement for these large data sets. For example, AI companies use Regatta to run their model training directly on data sets stored in S3. Regatta accelerates data access, so your applications experience optimized, local-like performance. Regatta's storage scales with your applications, and you only pay for what you use -- no need to guess how much storage or performance you need. With no complex configuration, you can set up Regatta in a single click.

one_liner.value: Transform S3 into a high-performance local disk

hits.name: Sandra AI
hits.long_description:
Sandra builds multilingual voice AI receptionists, specifically designed for car dealerships. It seamlessly handles customer calls—whether for appointments, service details, availability, or more—offering a natural, human-like experience 24/7. 

What sets Sandra apart is its deep integration with dealership management systems, allowing it to manage even the most complex queries. This ensures no calls or leads are missed, boosting both customer satisfaction and team efficiency.

The car dealership industry handles over 3 billion calls annually, with each call averaging 4 to 6 minutes. Traditional call centers charge between $1 and $2 per minute, depending on the complexity of the service. Thus, we estimate the total addressable market for inbound calls alone to exceed $26 billion a year. This does not even account for future opportunities in outbound calls.

Before launching Sandra, the founding team spent years working in the automotive and call center industries during their time at McKinsey. The three co-founders graduated in Data Science and AI from institutions like MIT, Ecole Polytechnique and HEC Paris.
hits.one_liner: Sandra.ai builds the leading voice AI receptionist for car dealerships

hits.name: Rulebase
hits.long_description: You’ve likely heard, "This call will be recorded for training and monitoring purposes." Usually, this means a person listens to the call, takes notes, and identifies compliance issues while also coaching the customer service representative. We believe large language models can perform quality assurance more efficiently, accurately, and cost-effectively. That’s why we’re building infrastructure to handle quality assurance for both human customer service agents and AI agents.
hits.one_liner: The AI compliance and QA analyst for financial services.

long_description.value: You’ve likely heard, "This call will be recorded for training and monitoring purposes." hits.name: OpenFunnel
hits.long_description:
Developers have scattered yet heavy touchpoints that represent adoption and buying intent. We aggregate and make sense of these interactions across open and closed developer channels using AI Agents.

This enables us to monitor dev tool adoption and generate highly qualified developer leads that we enrich and update in real time. 

GTM Teams & Founders use us to sell better.
